messages.title: A MESSAGE FROM PETER FLORENCE
messages.content: I have been a businessman for 30 years. I understand the needs of small businesses - vital for our economy. I have a common sense approach to politics.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Introduce an Australian point based immigration policy to control immigration

mentions.candidate: I have been a businessman for 30 years.

issues.brexitEurope: Leaving the EU enables UKIP to pledge an EXTRA £3bn p.a. for the NHS, introduce an Australian point based immigration policy to control immigration, and to increase wages.
issues.economy: I understand the needs of small businesses - vital for our economy. Wages are not rising because of the endless labour supply from the EU. So 'minimum wage' is 'maximum wage' for many.
issues.education: The Ealing & Acton population is growing so there is pressure on local schools, NHS services, traffic & parking.
issues.health: Leaving the EU enables UKIP to pledge an EXTRA £3bn p.a. for the NHS
issues.immigration: Leaving the EU enables UKIP to...introduce an Australian point based immigration policy to control immigration

housing.content: The Ealing & Acton population is growing so there is pressure on local schools, NHS services, traffic & parking. But A&E units are under threat of closure, school places are harder to secure, and police work is more difficult.

leaflet.personalStatement: I have been a businessman for 30 years.

images.caption: Why UKIP for EALING CENTRAL & ACTON
